mapper.select: select db.DORMITORY_BUILDING_ID as dormitoryBuildingId, db.DORMITORY_BUILDING_NAME as dormitoryBuildingName, db.MANAGER_ID as managerId, s.STAFF_NAME as managerName, d.DORMITORY_NAME as dormitoryName from EAS_DORMITORYBUILDING db inner join EAS_STAFF s on s.STAFF_ID = db.MANAGER_ID inner join EAS_DORMITORY d on d.DORMITORY_BUILDING_ID = db.DORMITORY_BUILDING_ID ${ew.customSqlSegment}
